io.spine.server.entity

Interface TransactionListener<I,E extends TransactionalEntity<I,S,B>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - ID type of the entity under transaction
    E - type of entity under transaction
    S - state type of the entity under transaction
    B - type of ValidatingBuilder of S
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityLifecycleMonitor, TransactionListener.SilentWitness

    @Internal
public interface TransactionListener<I,E extends TransactionalEntity<I,S,B>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>
    A common contract for the transaction listeners.

    Provides an ability to add callbacks to the transaction execution stages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TransactionListener.SilentWitness<I,E extends TransactionalEntity<I,S,B>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>
      An implementation of a TransactionListener which does not set any behavior for its callbacks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAfterCommit(EntityRecordChange change)
      A callback invoked after a successful commit.
      void onAfterPhase(Transaction.Phase<I,E,S,B> phase)
      A callback invoked after applying a transaction phase.
      void onBeforeCommit(E entity, S state, io.spine.core.Version version, LifecycleFlags lifecycleFlags)
      A callback invoked before committing the transaction.
      void onTransactionFailed(java.lang.Throwable t, E entity, S state, io.spine.core.Version version, LifecycleFlags lifecycleFlags)
      A callback invoked if the commit has failed.

    • Method Detail

      • onAfterPhase

        void onAfterPhase(Transaction.Phase<I,E,S,B> phase)
        A callback invoked after applying a transaction phase.

        This callback is invoked for both successfully applied and failed phases.

        Parameters:
        phase - the phase which was applied before this callback is invoked

      • onBeforeCommit

        void onBeforeCommit(E entity,
                    S state,
                    io.spine.core.Version version,
                    LifecycleFlags lifecycleFlags)
        A callback invoked before committing the transaction.
        Parameters:
        entity - an entity modified within the transaction
        state - a state to set to the entity during the commit
        version - a version to set to the entity during the commit
        lifecycleFlags - a lifecycle flags to set to the entity during the commit

      • onTransactionFailed

        void onTransactionFailed(java.lang.Throwable t,
                         E entity,
                         S state,
                         io.spine.core.Version version,
                         LifecycleFlags lifecycleFlags)
        A callback invoked if the commit has failed.
        Parameters:
        t - a Throwable caused the commit failure
        entity - an entity modified within the transaction
        state - a state to set to the entity during the commit
        version - a version to set to the entity during the commit
        lifecycleFlags - a lifecycle flags to set to the entity during the commit

      • onAfterCommit

        void onAfterCommit(EntityRecordChange change)
        A callback invoked after a successful commit.
        Parameters:
        change - the change of the entity under transaction
